representation_information.name: Information technology -- Generic coding of moving pictures and associated audio information (formal name), MPEG-2 (common name), Main Profile
representation_information.description: Profile of MPEG-2 that permits the use of Intra-coded (I) frames, predicted (P) frames, and bidirectionally predicted (B) frames. Conformance points for this bitstream exist at the following levels: Low, Main, High-1440, and High. At the Main Level, the broadcast-stream picture size is 720x576 pixels (non-square pixels), with color sampling of 4:2:0 and a maximum data rate of 15 Mb/s.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
